body:
The art is already good, the artist just needs some more practice. The story seems feasible in the world of kono suba but we are actually given a scenario where kazuma can’t help memgumin in her training so darkness substituted him so it’s more feasible to see darkness joining in lol. The fact that it’s a monster/animal x female deducted it -5 points for normal weeb but for degenerates it’s a good thing. If you’re not into animal/ monster x female, not for you.  It’s also a rape so let’s deduct 2 more points for a normal weeb. 
Here’s my final deduction:
Normal doujin enjoyer (no harsh tags): 2/10
KonoSuba Hdoujin enjoyer: 6/10 megumin the best
Degenerate doujin enjoyer: 8/10 art needs more polish
KonoSuba hdoujin enjoyer: 11/10 the tags speaks for themself with rape, tentacles, and monster. 
Overall a normal doujin enjoyer might not like it due to the tags but konosuba h enjoyer might like this ngl. I  personally am a degenerate so I rate it 11/10. Though the art can be improve.
